channel.title: Help On Server ( Quick Please )
channel.description:
[size=13pt]Ok i have this hacker that keeps messing up my server and I need quick asstiance and here are the things I could use[/size]
- Tell me how to block off bad words so when you say them, they will appear in * - How to get rid of someone on hamachi [b]PERMEMANTLY[/b]
[i]Please help me[/i] [b]QUICK![/b]
